definition: the quality of behaving or speaking in such a manner as to create a false appearance of great importance or worth
details:
noun
- the quality of behaving or speaking in such a manner as to create a false appearance of great importance or worth
= example: the quality of behaving or speaking in such a manner as to create a false appearance of great importance or worth
= synonyms: pretension
- lack of elegance as a consequence of being pompous and puffed up with vanity
= synonyms: inflation
